author: yuyiguo
body:
This release include: 
1. Let user specify if only valid files counted when call listFileSummaries API.
2. fixed a DBS client bug that prevent update file status when the file list is very long.
3. fixed bug in DBS2SetFileStatus.py script.
4. Extend DBSUser validation in Lexicon.py based user reported DNs.
title: dbs3 tag 3.2.5 and WMCore 0.9.96
